title: Knights Vow and new Keystone HYPE!
body:
https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/preseason-2017/en_US/e8b9fdc1b422a536983bfd583c13deb77ac2146f/assets/img/gameplay/items/knights-vow.jpg

#KNIGHT'S VOW

+ HEALTH
+ HEALTH REGEN
+ ARMOR
+ PASSIVE: Designate an allied champion as your partner. Gain armor and movement speed when near your partner, redirect a portion of their damage taken to yourself, and heal for a portion of their damage dealt.

I now know my new core item on Taric. :D

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/preseason-2017/en_US/e8b9fdc1b422a536983bfd583c13deb77ac2146f/assets/img/gameplay/masteries/courage-of-the-colossus.jpg

#COURAGE OF THE COLOSSUS

Gain a shield when you inflict crowd control on an enemy.

I now know my new Keystone for Taric. :D

Supports getting some love this preseason to help fight off those shiny new assassins!

I'm guessing the new keystone will probably be reserved for engage champs ^(see GrReaper96) rather than our favorite manmode champ... Knight's vow however, might be really good. But because of the dmg reduction passive converting to true dmg, I'm not sure at what stage of the game this would be optimal. It definitely has some fun risk/rewards even if it doesn't end up being that good. I'm guessing it would probably be a bad buy against  Veigar though because unlike bond of stone, knight's vow doesn't appear to have a hp cutoff. And that little master of evil shouldn't need any help getting a kill with that ult.

That being said the survivability it provides with the heals + 400 health + (20 base + 40 passive + 6, 7.5, 9, 10.5, 12 Bastion) armour is nothing to smirk at.
I'm super excited to try this out.
